attributes.action: Restrict inside lane of all A & B roads to bus [not taxi], recovery & emergency service vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many buses run in convoy hence 20 minute services often stretch to 1 hour plus. Clearing the inside-lane of all parked vehicles & regular traffic ensures emergency vehicles can keep to speed-limits & arrive safely at their destination. Issue violation letters [not fines] to vehicle owners & their insurers.
